page.title: 12Industry in Clifton (1)
page.content: The main industrial area in Clifton is on the site of Weston Evans who make{paper machinery, textile {machinery}and{mechanical handling {machinery.}No-one in Clifton ever uses them because as fast as they are made they are{exported}to foreign countries. He told us that his company was the first in England to supply East Germany with{carpet making {machinery. { They have got}salesmen and service engineers. One had just come back from Turkey. It is an ideal site for Weston Evans because it is near the{motorway, the{main roads,}the{airport}and the {railway station.} They have 85{employees}and they take on two{apprentices}every two years. 75% of the workforce live in Clifton.
